name: Shivam Dhawan
note:
Company Name: GetBoarded (Education Management) - https://www.getboarded.com/

Contact Person: Marta Matias (Communication and Media Manager) Aveiro, Portugal

Product: Platform for a work-travel opportunities with a personal driven approach to matching with a work experience.
Country- Location: Ilhavo, Portugal

Target Audience: Couch students,b2c,b2b

Immediate Requirement: Marta has no idea, that's why she sent me all the links of their company in the social media and asked my thoughts:

https://www.instagram.com/getboarded/

https://www.facebook.com/Getboarded

https://www.linkedin.com/company/getboarded/

https://twitter.com/gtbrdd

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFru8qD0nR37NMHUYuTRIeg

https://getboarded.tech/

https://in.pinterest.com/getboarded/

https://getboarded.tech/

I proposed: Content managers, Illustrators, Video editors and a Lead Generation Managers. She needs to think about it and asked to send all the information about our services and Service Agreement example for her to share with their CEO. We've exchanged the emails and decided to keep in touch.
Next call: 19/01/21 12:30
GetBoarded - Meeting
We've discussed the options of our partnership. Marta and GetBoarded Company want to add the CVs of their candidates on our web-site.
We can upgrade our site and on the next meeting on Thursday we'll invite the Content department and discus what way it will be possible.
Also, we have an interview call on Monday with the candidates - SEO/SMM/Content Managers. Lead Generation Managers is for the future needs.
shivam@getboarded.com will also be present on both meetings.
GetBoarded - Meeting(25.01.21)

We've discussed an option for our partnership with the company GetBoarded . Timur was also present on the meeting. Marta want to make an advertisement: we'll post the CVs of their candidates, and they will post ours, in response. The proposal is interesting for us and tomorrow we'll invite Sergey to discuss the templates. 

Next meeting: tomorrow at 13:00 our time.

Marta Matias (GetBoarded) - Interview (25.01.21 at 1:30 am)

Hanna (ID  588) - https://rh-s.com/marketer/content-managers/hanna-v/ 
22 y.o. She is creating, updating content, SEO texts and articles.

Tetiana (ID 927)
Tatiana's finished marketing classes and currently is working with Google Ads.

Daria (ID 914) - https://rh-s.com/marketer/smm-managers-marketer/daria-s/
21y.o.
She is dealing with keyword planner, promotion and keyword research.

Today we also have an interview meeting at 4pm our time. We are going to interview Valeria (ID 828) - https://rh-s.com/copywriter/valeriia-b/ and 
Bachynska Anastasiia (ID 909).

Marta Matias and Sales Remote Helpers (25.01.21 at 4pm)

Anastasia (ID 909)
17 y.o.
She is studying on Biology facultacy and is interested in writing.
Marta has no any questions to her.

We decided that Hanna (ID  588) - https://rh-s.com/marketer/content-managers/hanna-v/ is the best candidate for the position they interested in.
Marta need some time to discuss the hiring of Hanna with their Marketing Department and tomorrow we'll make a final decision.

GetBoarded - Meeting(26.01.21)

On the meeting we've discussed possible ways to use the templates from GetBoarded Company on our web-site.
From their side, they will hire our employees.

Next meeting will be held on Friday/Tuesday between 3 and 4pm our time and we'll invite our back-end developer to understand what way it's possible. First to start, we decided to make a test variant.
Fresh results (01.02.2021):

We talked to Anna (ID 588) and Roman Batrak today.

Roman is experienced in Google and Facebook Analytics.

Anna is a content writer and is making a keyword research, using Google/Facebook ads, and she is writing articles.
Marta sent them the list of their websites and the common question was: What can they possibly change there to make the site visible for their target audience.

As to Anna, she would possibly add some information about their services, making a keyword research to create an article for the post. Then she'd check the traffic to understand what exactly people are looking for.

Roman said he could find the way to make a site more visible by integrating analytics for the site, mentioned the possible ways and ads for this.

Results: They liked both candidates, and maybe they will take to the project both candidates (part-time), Roman is for Analytics and Anna is for articles' creation and advertisements. For these, Marta needs to discuss everything with her colleagues. She will let us know what she decided afterwards.

GetBoarded - Meeting (05.02.21)
Getboarded company want to implement their technology into our website. Shivam is the founder of the platform. He showed us that platform. It gives us a board to manage all profiles where it is possible to choose different designs and colors and the users will be able to download the candidates' CVs.
Our developer Alex had some questions concerning where do they insert this platform for the most often asked integration and where should we place their script (Modal window). 
So we are going to create a chat, where we can discuss the details and get a support from the specialist of their technical department. Marta +351912320439
Marta's also sent a presentation with an instructions.
Fresh results of the meeting: ( 11.02.21 )
GetBoarded - Introductory call
Anna V (ID 588) starts working with Getboarded company from 15.02.21 (Monday) - for the Microlearning project. 
Her working hours will be following: 14-18:00 our time (12-16 Lisbon time).
Anna's communication with Marta is going to be via WhatsApp.
Anna's contacts:
annvasyuta@gmail.com
+380952781486
Marta's contacts:
Marta Matias
martasoaresmatias@gmail.com
+351912320439

name: Ken Krysinski
note:
skype call 24.07.19, Digital marketing agency that exist for 15 years. Have remote teams in US and India. Teresa has a family in Bulgaria. 
Interested in Magento dev, React Native dev, designers and content managers. Может быть крупный заказ
Наташа Литвинова с 07.08

Fresh results : Our company is currently working with the client.(27.01.2021)



We interviewed candidates for the SocialFix company.

Candidates: 
Anna
https://rh-s.com/designers/anna-l/
Bachelor in motion design and fine arts. She is good at shape animation, typography and using visual effects. Anna works for RH for 7 months.

Tetiana
https://rh-s.com/marketer/lead-generation-managers/tetiana-v/
She is a lead generation manager. Her tasks include to find leads through LinkedIn and Google. Uses CRM system and B2B marketing strategy in her work as well. 

Khrystyna
https://rh-s.com/marketer/lead-generation-managers/khrystyna-y/
She works as a lead generation manager for 5 months. Her main task is to find a suitable client and to set up a call with him. She can search for up to 100 leads per day. Besides she can use CRM system such as Hubspot and Getmail for finding leads through emails.

Among all the candidates, Terry approved Anna for mutual collaboration. Thus, we'd like to set up an introductory call for her with the company tomorrow, on July, 22, at 18.00 
Start date 23rd of July


Carolyn also liked Khrystyna and her pro-activeness, but unfortunately this candidate can't work in USA time zone. That's why we've decided to find more candidates and set up an interview with them on Friday, 23rd of July, at 17.00
Also, we need to add some CV's of Illustrators.

Компания занимается сошал медиа маркетингом и всем, что с ним связано (дизайн, видео, сайты, пиар и всяческое продвижение, и тд)

client_candidates.comment:
Kateryna https://rh-s.com/kateryna-f/
Can create banners, presentations. Work with Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, After Effects and Figma.

Vadym https://rh-s.com/vadym-p/
Web+Graphic designer. Work with Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, After Effects and Figma.

Oleksandra https://rh-s.com/oleksandra-le/
Web designer. Work with Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator. Main tool - Figma. Also have knowledge in UI/UX Design.

client_communications.note:
We interviewed candidates for the SocialFix company.

Candidates:
Designers
Oleksandra https://rh-s.com/oleksandra-le/
Web designer. Work with Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator. Main tool - Figma. Also have knowledge in UI/UX Design.

Kateryna https://rh-s.com/kateryna-f/
Can create banner, presentations. Work with Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, After Effects and Figma.

Vadym https://rh-s.com/vadym-p/
Web+Graphic designer. Work with Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, After Effects and Figma.

Terry and Carolyne will discuss who is more suitable for them and come back to us by email with a decision. 
Also, we need to send portfolios of each candidate.

We  interviewed candidates for the SocialFix company.

Candidates:
LG manager (who can work with influencers, like Bahmana)
Sofiia https://rh-s.com/sofiia-hry/
Worked as a Sales Manager. Now - LG manager. 

Anna https://rh-s.com/anna-uli/
LG manager. 

Mykhailo https://rh-s.com/mykhailo-miz/
He is living in Germany. Can experience copywriting, content writing, link building.  Now - LG manager. 

Myroslava https://rh-s.com/myroslava-myh/
LG manager.

Carolyn likes Mykhailo the most. She needs to discuss all information with Terry and will come back to us with the decision by email.

RESULT

We interviewed Mike one more time. 

Mike https://rh-s.com/mykhailo-miz/

During this call Mike introduced himself one more time. Terry and Carolyn asked about experience, personal qualities. 
Terry described what they are doing, what kind of outreach they are doing now, what tasks they expect Mike to do. 

Terry said that Mike is a very great fit for them. 
They will be ready to start from next week, the date they will inform us by email.

Today Terry and Carolyn do not have time for video editors. We will set up an interview on Friday at the same time as today.

Also they are looking for SEO specialists - strong candidates, who can do strategy, keywords research. 
Set up an interview on Monday at the same time as today.

We  interviewed candidates for the SocialFix company.

Candidates:

SEO Managers
Arina https://rh-s.com/oryna-f/ 
Team Lead of the SEO department. She can do keyword research, check traffic, upload content to websites via Wordpress, and have knowledge in Google Ads. 


Mariia https://rh-s.com/mariia-s/
For now she works as a content manager, knows SEO, PPC, YouTube Ads, FbAds, Google Ads, copywriting.

Olena https://rh-s.com/olena-m/
Olena can do keyresearch, copywriting, Google Ads. 


Vita  https://rh-s.com/vita-vas/
SEO specialists - keyword research, google ads, copywriter. 

Terry said that all of the candidates were great. She assumes that Mariia or Arina will be the best fit for them, but Terry needs one more call - on the 9th of November at the same time as today. 

And also we need to set up one more call with candidates for LG (like Bahmana) role - on the 10th of November at the same time as today.

We interviewed candidates from LG department 

Candidates:

Lead generation managers (like Bahmana)
Anna  https://rh-s.com/anna-k/
Elizaveta https://rh-s.com/elizaveta-vak/
Aleksandra https://rh-s.com/aleksandra-b/

Carolyn and Terry would like to try with Anna. 
About the start date they will inform via email.

RESULT
We interviewed the candidate for SocialFix company (replacement for Michael Alutin)

Candidates:
Mykyta https://rh-s.com/mykyta-h/
Worked as a customer support service representative for a foreign company. Copywriter; can work with Data Entry, Data Search, Copywriting, CRM. 

Carolyn is satisfied with Nikita, but she needs to discuss everything with Terry. They will come back to us as soon as they have a final decision. 
Also, previously, we agreed that Nikita will work for 2 weeks for free, as this is a replacement and Carolyn asked about such an opportunity.

SM Anastasia T

type.name: Follow Up
type.description: Повторное обращение к клиенту или лиду для продолжения взаимодействия.

client_communications.note:
How have you been? My name is Juliya and I am one of the Remote Helpers Team. 

As the year draws to a close, we at  Remote Helpers want to extend our heartfelt thanks for your continued partnership. To show our appreciation we're excited to present an exclusive offer just for you.

 Special December Discount - 40% Off on Additional Hires! 

For the entire month of December, when you onboard an additional remote employee, you’ll receive a 40% discount on the services. It's our way of saying thank you and helping you prepare for a prosperous New Year.

I believe this is a fantastic opportunity to bolster your workforce with extra help at almost half of the cost. Whether it’s developers, designers, or digital marketers, we’ve got many candidates ready to jump into your projects https://www.rh-s.com/.

Enjoy the flexibility of our services without any long-term obligations.

Are you ready to Get Started? Remember, this offer is valid until the end of December, so let’s make the most of it!

We're thrilled to support your business growth and look forward to continuing our successful collaboration.

Do you need my assistance in picking up candidates?)

Warm regards,
Julia

client_communications.note: Follow up

type.name: Follow Up
type.description: Повторное обращение к клиенту или лиду для продолжения взаимодействия.

client_communications.note:
Black Friday offer!

You can purchase hours at a 25% discount and allocate them across multiple specialists.

40 hours for €650 (normally €850)
80 hours for €1050 (normally €1400)
160 hours for €1800 (normally €2400)

Divide the purchased hours between different roles: use 20 hours for a designer and 20 hours for a developer, ensuring you get the exact expertise you need, when you need it.

This offer is only valid until 06.12.2024. Take advantage of this opportunity today: https://rh-s.com/sale.

Best regards,

Sona

skype call 24.07.19, Digital marketing agency that exist for 15 years. Have remote teams in US and India. Teresa has a family in Bulgaria. 
Interested in Magento dev, React Native dev, designers and content managers. Может быть крупный заказ
Наташа Литвинова с 07.08

Fresh results : Our company is currently working with the client.(27.01.2021)



We interviewed candidates for the SocialFix company.

Candidates: 
Anna
https://rh-s.com/designers/anna-l/
Bachelor in motion design and fine arts. She is good at shape animation, typography and using visual effects. Anna works for RH for 7 months.

Tetiana
https://rh-s.com/marketer/lead-generation-managers/tetiana-v/
She is a lead generation manager. Her tasks include to find leads through LinkedIn and Google. Uses CRM system and B2B marketing strategy in her work as well. 

Khrystyna
https://rh-s.com/marketer/lead-generation-managers/khrystyna-y/
She works as a lead generation manager for 5 months. Her main task is to find a suitable client and to set up a call with him. She can search for up to 100 leads per day. Besides she can use CRM system such as Hubspot and Getmail for finding leads through emails.

Among all the candidates, Terry approved Anna for mutual collaboration. Thus, we'd like to set up an introductory call for her with the company tomorrow, on July, 22, at 18.00 
Start date 23rd of July


Carolyn also liked Khrystyna and her pro-activeness, but unfortunately this candidate can't work in USA time zone. That's why we've decided to find more candidates and set up an interview with them on Friday, 23rd of July, at 17.00
Also, we need to add some CV's of Illustrators.

Компания занимается сошал медиа маркетингом и всем, что с ним связано (дизайн, видео, сайты, пиар и всяческое продвижение, и тд)

Good day, Remy,


Thank you so much for reaching out to us again. We are delighted to welcome you back.


I'm pleased to inform you that we have a suitable candidate, Mariana, for your requirements. She is available for an interview tomorrow, Wednesday, August 2nd, at 11 am (Ukrainian time).

Publimats - Interview

Wednesday, August 2 · 11:00 – 11:30 am

Time zone: Europe/Kiev

client_communications.note: Напомнить про старт 29.08.23 с дизайнером Марьяной Роман

type.name: Follow Up
type.description: Повторное обращение к клиенту или лиду для продолжения взаимодействия.

client_communications.note:
We interviewed the candidates for the Publimats company.


Candidates for Designer’s position:


Mariana R https://www.rh-s.com/designers/ux-ui-designer/mariana-r/

(After Effects, Elementor, Figma, Illustrator, invisio, Miro, Photoshop (PS), Tilda, Wordpress)


Mariana: She introduced herself in English with the presentation where the client had an opportunity checking her portfolio and different works. She told the client the tools she can use to work.


Responsibilities: Mostly they do advertising on social media, so they need a web designer who can create designs for social media (Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, SnapChat, Google ads).. Also our candidate should be able to design a website in WordPress (they use Divi, but Elementor can work as well). In addition, one more rolе for our designer will be designing the landing pages (They will give her all the content in French that she will have to include to the landing page). She can use the translators to have an idea what that content is about. Also the client said that there are some clients who want the business cards to be done. It may be additional work for Mariana.


Conclusion: The client wanted only Mariana to interview and during the call he was checking her works, communicating with her and liked her style. He is going to start working with Mariana 29.08.23.


Next Contact Day: Follow up 25.08.23


Start date: 29.08.23


SM Marina

SA Anton

LG Marina Duka (Пархоменко Елена - fired)

name: Chris
note:
Company Name : Mavomed

Company Website : www.mavomed.de

Contact Person : Chris
 
Specialties: Creating Digital 
 
Country-Location : Germany

Target Audience: worldwide

Immediate Requirement : Mavomed specializes in selling medical products. An optimized landing page should be created for the marketing of a selected Mavomed product. The topic of SEO also played an important role in positioning oneself well on the search results page. 
As for now urgently Client needs to fix their website with WordPress. That is why we decided to meet today at 14;30 our time with the team leader of developers at this point.
Also they are growing right now and they need someone for Data Entry ( to put and to fill the information, working with it German language needed) and Advertising PPC ( to make more sales with this service. But has to be really strong background) German is a + 

Next Step: send all information about our services and suitable CV's, references

Next Contact Day: today at 14:30 a second call with client to discuss their website

The client was engaged by LG manager.

SM Marina (Ruzaliya)

We had an interview for Mavomed 

Candidate
Igor, lead generation manager. 

We discussed the projects and the workflow. Chris liked Ihor and he would like to start next Friday on full-time basis. Chris wants to sign a contract for one year. He will review everything with his lawyers until Friday.  Chris was also wondering if they can delay a payment for one year. Further request: PPC managers. 

Next Step: Sending contract 

SM Marina (Ruzaliya)

name: Martin Hedley
note:
Event Name: Zoom Meeting with Martin
Event Description: A conversation with Martin Hedley regarding talent acquisition or talent development with coaching or business relationships in the UAE, US or the UK.
Date & Time: 14:30 - 15:15 (Eastern European Time) on Monday, August 14, 2023
Location: This is a Zoom web conference.

You can join this meeting from your computer, tablet, or smartphone.
https://us06web.zoom.us/j/4551931264

Join the online meeting with Remote Helpers in Ukraine to uncover new pathways for maximizing the potential of Vision Achievement Limited team and resources.

Website: rh-s.com 

Company LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/vision-achievement-limited/

Site Company: https://www.visionachievement.uk/

Lead:  Martin Hedley    (https://www.linkedin.com/in/martinhedley/ )

Location: UK

Industrial:  Human Resources Services

Manager: Andriy Parchuk

client_candidates.comment:
Alina: introduced herself in English being very communicative, told about her working experience and LG strategy. Since the client is not familiar with LG personally and hasn’t had such an experience yet, that’s why he believes that Alina would be the great one doing this work. She said that she can’t promise an exact number of clients, but she is interested in doing her best.

Responsibilities: searching for potential clients through LinkedIn (the client will provide her with the scripts, but it should be reviewed to make it natural). The companies should consist of 20-1000 employees. The priority regarding the potential clients should be decision makers.

Conclusion: The client really liked Alina and got along with her as well. He is going to start working asap with a 40-hours package/month. If she gets along with his other co-workers and shows nice results, he will definitely change the hours into full-time. We agreed that the contract will be signed today, so we set up an introductory call tomorrow.

need_candidates.comment_requirements:

Professional skills: English knowledge is needed

Responsibilities: should be able to communicate in English and search for leads through LinkedIn as well as managing emails
